mapper.select: select id_despacho_interno_camion as id ,id_despacho_interno as "despachoInterno.id" from sstt_despachos_internos_camion where id_despacho_interno = #{id}

select dpc.id_despacho_interno_camion as id ,dpc.id_despacho_interno as "despachoInterno.id" from sstt_despachos_internos_camion dpc where id_despacho_interno_camion =(select max(dpc1.id_despacho_interno_camion) from sstt_despachos_internos_camion dpc1 where dpc1.id_despacho_interno = #{id})
